title: Wuks the info you need
body:
Got into champ select
screen went black, sound and everything still playing, but nothing was appearing on the screen
couldn't click, it auto dodged me for not picking a champ (i couldn't)
This proceeded to take away my last promo game

thats everything

replies.body: One time, last time it happened was a patch early season 4
Ah, well I don't think that this problem will happen again. It's a pretty rare occurring error.

Hey DarkShade918!

Was this a one-time issue or a reoccurring issue? If it's reoccurring, you might want to try [**Repairing Your Client**](http://www.wrenchmen.org/resources/knowledgebase/1?view=article).
